parts.text: Can you describe the layout of the specifiying all the web components used and the position of them

You are going to receive a image of a web page, first divide the image into rows of content. Create a list with all the rows, each row will be a json object that includes the element of the row, in that json object you'll show the type of the element, and the position of it

For example, imagine that we have a page with two rows, the first row is a title centered and the second row is a grid with 3 cards, the json response should be [{"items": [{"elementType": "heading", "position":"middle"}]}, {"items": [{"elementType": "card", "position":"left"}, {"elementType": "card", "position":"middle"}, {"elementType": "card", "position":"right"}]}]

The element type should be narrowed to one of the items that we have available. For a title or a heading, the elementType is a heading. For a button or link the component is a button, for videos the component is external video, for image the component is image, for a longer text the component is paragraph, when we have a card like element the element type is card, for social media icons, even when there are many icons it itemtype is social, for a slider or carrousel use element type slider
Return the json directly without adding ```json and in only one line without newlines
